statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_purchases >= 3 AND total_spent > 500 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, total_spent ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY age ASC, total_purchases DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_email, purchase_total FROM customers WHERE purchase_total > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_total DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'e5cb7f4d-7a1f-47bc-b13c-704f1d97e770';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_total > 1000 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_total FROM customers WHERE purchase_total > (SELECT AVG(purchase_total) FROM customers);
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount = (SELECT MAX(purchase_amount) FROM purchase_history);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, recommended_product FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT recommended_product FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) as total_purchases FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_purchases > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT segment_name FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY recommendation_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers JOIN segments_customers ON customers.customer_id = segments_customers.customer_id WHERE segment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers ORDER BY purchase_history DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers JOIN segments_customers ON customers.customer_id = segments_customers.customer_id WHERE segment_id = '1234';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers JOIN segments_customers ON customers.customer_id = segments_customers.customer_id WHERE segment_id IN ('5678','9101');
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, recommendation_text FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id WHERE total_purchase_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, recommendations.recommendation_date FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id JOIN products ON recommendations.recommended_product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
